item.title: CVE-2022-35218|2024-09-16T19:15:40.514Z -- nhi -- card%E2%80%99s%20web%20service%20component
item.description: The NHI cardâ€™s web service component has a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation for packet origin parameter length. A LAN attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to disrupt service.
